overview_of_class: This introduction to the study of International Relations (IR) examines the development of IR theory by placing it in historical context. It seeks to provide the student with both an introduction to IR theory, an overview of the history that inspired that theory, and a critical engagement with theory by juxtaposing it with the history that conditioned its development, and the history that we are living in the present.
